ygData.subject: Re: faction changes in befallen
ygData.msgSnippet: I have noticed recently that faction messages are coming up that dont tell you who your faction has changed with. You faction with has gotten worse , or some
ygData.messageBody:
I have noticed recently that faction messages are coming up that dont
tell you who your faction has changed with.
"You faction with has gotten worse", or some such.
Thats it, doesnt say who with.

I cant say for sure, but i have a DE friend who is now on not so good
terms with the wandering Dragoons, since he started to go to Befallen.
And i also have another DE friend who needs to cast invis to undead to
get past the ghouls who guard the door to the guild in Neriak since
hunting befallen. Once inside, apparently, theres no prob, but the
ghouls seem to take offense for some reason.

Though on the Dragoon part, i know that one of them is associated with
Skelton Lrodd, so killing him may lower faction with that particular
Dragoon.

It does seem that the Befallen inhabitants do indeed affect, at least
somewhat, the faction in Neriak.

Guess theres no real way to know though.

Bathory
Cazic-Thule




--- Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...> wrote:
> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> faction hits in befallen IN NO WAY WHATSOEVER affect
> faction with the
> lodge of the dead! killing things in befallen
> affects
> BefallenInhabitants, while the lodge is only
> affected by things that
> change faction with TheDead.
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro
>
>
>
